review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
There is a one-liner without the use of `under`:
```suggestion
Proof. by move=> eq_t; congr flatten; apply: eq_map => x; rewrite eq_t. Qed.
```

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
  [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- y0 x :: t x] =i
```

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Lemma perm_allpairs_rconsr f s y0 t :
```

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment: I'm anticipating on the next renaming, I wanted `perm_allpairs_rconsr` to be a temporary alias for `allpairs_rconsr`, I may have forgotten the alias though :laughing:

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: Ah, I see! I didn't read CHANGELOG entries. So please add the alias instead.

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Lemma eq_allpairsr (f : forall x, T x -> R) s t1 t2 : (forall x, t1 x = t2 x) ->
  [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t1 x] = [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t2 x].
```

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
  already deprecated in favor of `allpairs_rconsr`, cf renamed
```
